name: AMC Consult
tagline: Easy and logical way to integrate your accounting
description:
Our vision is about developing and promoting solutions related to the area of Cash Management.
The development and maintenance of our bank solutions presume the presence of a wide range of competence and skills. Partly a deep technical understanding, but also business and process related skills.
Crossing the usual professional borders, we develop and offer innovated solutions in such a way that cash management becomes a strategic element to extend our customers future business opportunities.
